MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 and G63 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milndavie Road and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:12pm due to a grounded overhead electricity line near Lower Craigallian and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:15pm on Sunday, 07 March 2021
